skill.name: Global Conventions
skill.description: Follow consistent project structure, version control practices, environment configuration, code review processes, and development conventions across the entire application. Use this skill when organizing project files and directories, when writing commit messages or creating pull requests, when managing environment variables and configuration, when participating in code reviews, when defining testing requirements, when using feature flags, when maintaining changelogs, when documenting setup instructions, or when establishing consistent development practices across the team.
skill.summary: Follow consistent project structure, version control practices, environment configuration, code revi...
skill.author: DevanB

security_audit.summary: This is a prompt-only skill containing markdown instructions for AI behavior. No executable code, scripts, network calls, filesystem access, or external command execution. Pure instructional content for development conventions.

content.value_statement: Teams struggle with inconsistent code styles and practices. This skill provides AI-powered guidance on project structure, commit messages, code reviews, and development standards to maintain consistency across all team members and projects.
actual_capabilities: Organize project files and directories following consistent patterns
Write standardized commit messages and create proper pull requests
Manage environment variables and configuration files correctly
Participate in code reviews with consistent evaluation criteria
Define and maintain testing requirements before code merges
Implement feature flags and manage changelog documentation
limitations: Does not enforce conventions automatically - only provides guidance
Does not modify existing code to match conventions
Does not integrate with CI/CD pipelines or pre-commit hooks
Relies on AI understanding and applying conventions correctly

use_cases.title: Team Standards Guide
use_cases.description: New team members learn project conventions quickly by asking the AI for guidance on each task.

use_cases.title: Consistency Enforcement
use_cases.description: Maintainers receive consistent guidance when reviewing contributions from multiple contributors.

use_cases.title: Personal Best Practices
use_cases.description: Individual developers maintain disciplined practices across multiple projects and time periods.

prompt_templates.title: Project Structure
prompt_templates.prompt: How should I organize the files for a new feature module following our project conventions?

prompt_templates.title: Commit Messages
prompt_templates.prompt: What makes a good commit message for this change that adds user authentication?

prompt_templates.title: Code Review
prompt_templates.prompt: What should I look for when reviewing a pull request for our codebase conventions?

prompt_templates.title: Configuration
prompt_templates.prompt: How should I set up environment configuration for a new environment like staging?

best_practices: Apply conventions consistently across all new code contributions
Document any deviations from standard conventions with clear justification
Update team documentation when conventions evolve or improve
anti_patterns: Applying different conventions to different parts of the codebase without clear rationale
Making convention decisions without consulting the existing project patterns
Assuming AI knows your specific project conventions without providing context

faq.question: Does this skill automatically fix code style issues?
faq.answer: No. This skill provides guidance on conventions but does not automatically modify code or enforce rules.

faq.question: Can I customize conventions for my specific project?
faq.answer: Yes. Provide your project-specific conventions as context when asking for guidance.

faq.question: Does this integrate with linters or formatters?
faq.answer: No. This skill provides conversational guidance rather than integrating with build tools.

faq.question: Is my code or project data shared anywhere?
faq.answer: No. This is a prompt-only skill that operates within your existing AI conversation context.

faq.question: Why are my convention suggestions not being followed?
faq.answer: Ensure you reference your project conventions explicitly or provide them as background context.

faq.question: How does this compare to using a style guide directly?
faq.answer: This skill translates abstract conventions into specific actionable advice for your context.
